https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7slcRVlqFthzjTbnXFLoQ7LE053.jpg The master of Italian horror, Lucio Fulci, stars as... Lucio Fulci, a filmmaker with a reputation for gruesome horror films. His body of work has started to plague his mental state, and he is haunted by the grotesque set-pieces his mind has conjured up during his career. His psychiatrist, Egon Schwarz, uses a hypnotised Fulci as an avatar to carry out his own disturbed fantasies, in hopes of ruining the masterâ€™s reputation once and for all. A Cat in the Brain
